title: Best ADC champion in lol ?
body: I love Vayne and the way she plays. I am looking for a champion that would deal a lot of damage and fast, I have been looking into Kalista and Jinx and Varus but i couldn't decide so i decided to ask you guys.

replies.body:
"Best" is very broad and open to interpretation. But here's a link to champion.gg that can inform anyone hoping to learn or discuss. http://champion.gg/statistics/#?sortBy=general.overallPosition&order=ascend&roleSort=ADC

Either way, there are lots of adjustments made to ADCs from patch to patch. Anyone who can ever contest the title of "Best ADC" will get changed. To keep it in perspective, 4 seasons ago {{champion:6}} + {{champion:44}} bot lane was the strongest and most hotly contested duo lane in the competitive scene.

{{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:67}} 

are the 4 horsemen of ADCs. All of them are stupid strong right now.

It's trist.

She has both features an ADC wants at their highest peaks. Huge auto attack damage and huge ability casting damage.

oh and she has insane peel, siege and mobility w/ resets.

THANKS YOU GUYZ FOR EVERYTHING I HAVE DECIDED TO GET JINX SINCE I ALREADY OWN TRISTANA AND VAYNE

Tristana...good early game, can push with passive on her E, rocket jump is great defensively and offensively from team fight resets...strong auto attack speed steroid, insane tower pressure, hyper carry from her passive increase in AA range per level.

these 3 are solo q gods.
nice range good damage and great self peel. jinx not so much but makes up for it with insane dps.
Kalista, easy pentas, easy hard carry

The top three (opinion) right now are:
{{champion:67}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:222}} 

Vayne is a super late game hypercarry, once you get a good build you can pretty much 1v1 anybody with enough skill.
Sivir and Jinx are more teamfight oriented, Sivir more so on chasing down single targets and Jinx doing AOE damage.

{{champion:429}} is very good as well, she has high mobility and good damage. She isn't a crit ADC like Jinx but her damage is really good.

Some others I like are {{champion:22}} for her single target burst and utility.
{{champion:51}} for her range 
I don't have too much experience with {{champion:110}} so I cant say much about him.

hope this helps
jinx > kalista/trist > kog/vayne > everyone else, situational for your team.

Lucian for sure. Awesome burst dmg at all points of the game, mobility, one of the best passives in the game, almost unrivaled level 2 power spike, great duelist, ult can deal over 2,000 dmg, Q is so so easy to poke with in lane.
